name: Chess+
description:
Chess+ is your 3D realistic Chess Experience for your Computer! Select from numerous difficulties and improve your skills! Become the next Master Chess Gambit.

Chess+ uses the latest technology in emulating various skills. Also included are the ability to take back moves, change viewing angles and camera perspective, and a simple touch and move interface.

Download Chess+ today and become the next Chess Master!

Features:
* Spectacular 3D Graphics
* Intuitive Chess Engine
* Various camera angles
* Take back moves
* Fluid Chess Animation
* Different Difficulty Levels
